review: An inexpensive, effective way to stream video to your HDTV. This unit uses your phone, tablet or PC to control streaming through your wifi network, so if you don't have a tablet or equivalent, Chromecast is far less cost effective than Roku. The tablet control app for Netflix is excellent. The small "dongle" is plugged into the HDMI socket on your HDTV and is powered by a USB cable that can be plugged into the wall or into your TV if it has a USB port. Supplied instructions are vague but several videos online explain the process quite well.
